content: Our track orientation session will be December 17th at 1pm Eastern. Here is the link: https://ibm.webex.com/ibm/j.php?MTID=m791d944f8147f621352cff07d80e21d3

We are looking forward to presenting on our IG tomorrow (Thursday 1/14 at 11am and 3pm ET). For reference, here are a few relevant links:

  • IG: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-icsr-ae-reporting/branches/main/index.html
  • Session PPT: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Transfusion+and+Immunization+Adverse+Event+Track?preview=/97459097/97477463/HL7%20Connectathon%20Jan21%20Trans%20Vax%20AdverseEvent%20IG.pdf
  • Confluence IG: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Implementation+Guide+for+Transfusion+and+Vaccination+Adverse+Event+Reporting
  • Confluence Track: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Transfusion+and+Immunization+Adverse+Event+Track
  • Whova: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202101/Agenda/1436592
